privateServers.why.title: Why a Nitrado Gameserver?
privateServers.why.list.0: Easy Management: Install mods & plugins, manage servers with friends, and get multilingual support.
privateServers.why.list.1: High Reliability: Enjoy low pings, daily backups, DDoS protection, and premium hardware.
privateServers.why.list.2: Full Flexibility: Change runtime, switch games anytime, and scale your server as needed.
privateServers.why.list.3: Community Driven: Access Discord, events, and helpful guides built for players.
privateServers.faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
privateServers.faq.q1: How do private servers work in Dune: Awakening?
privateServers.faq.a1: When renting a private server, you receive a dedicated instance containing one Hagga Basin — the same map as official servers. You can do everything as on the public servers. The server belongs to a World that includes other private servers. A World can be selected during setup. Players retain access to large-scale multiplayer content, including shared hubs and the Deep Desert, across servers in the same World.
privateServers.faq.q2: How can I move between maps?
privateServers.faq.a2: Travel across private servers within the same World is possible. This includes the ability to move between personal servers, social hubs, and the Deep Desert while keeping progress intact.
privateServers.faq.q3: How many Deep Desert maps are there?
privateServers.faq.a3: Each World contains a shared Deep Desert. All private servers within that World connect to the same instance, supporting a unified player experience.
privateServers.faq.q4: If I have questions or run into problems, how do I get help?
privateServers.faq.a4: Support is available via the contact form or live tech support provided with all server plans. Assistance is available for technical issues, setup, and billing.
privateServers.faq.q5: Can I cancel my subscription anytime?
privateServers.faq.a5: Yes, subscriptions can be canceled at any time. Access will continue through the remainder of the billing period.
privateServers.faq.q6: Can I upgrade or downgrade my server package?
privateServers.faq.a6: Absolutely. To upgrade, open your server panel, click the three dots next to the server name, and choose Manage Subscriptions. For downgrades, contact support for assistance.
privateServers.benefits.title: Why Choose This Dune: Awakening Hosting?
privateServers.benefits.description: Premium private server hosting for Dune: Awakening, built for performance, reliability, and simplicity. With Nitrado's infrastructure, you get low-latency access, robust support, and effortless setup.
privateServers.benefits.world.title: Unique World System
privateServers.benefits.world.descriptio: Dune: Awakening private servers are part of a larger World. This allows travel across servers, access to the Deep Desert, and shared experiences while maintaining private control over your own space.
privateServers.benefits.custom.title: Server Customization
privateServers.benefits.custom.list.3: Name your server and set passwords
privateServers.benefits.custom.descripti: Admin features are still evolving, but current tools offer plenty of flexibility for server owners.
privateServers.benefits.travel.title: Seamless Travel & Collaboration
privateServers.benefits.travel.descripti: Players can visit other servers in the same World, making it perfect for community events, alliances, or rivalries — all while keeping character progress.
privateServers.benefits.quickStart.title: Get Started Quickly
privateServers.benefits.quickStart.descr: Hosting a Dune: Awakening server has never been easier — launch, manage, and enjoy your server in minutes with Nitrado's intuitive platform.
